post.description: Creates a new user with the provided information

get.summary: Fetches a user's associated company by the given user ID
get.description: Finds the user's company with the given user's ID in the database

200.description: Successfull fetch of a user's company from the database

404.description: There does not exist any user in the database such that the given id matches their id OR there is no such user with the given ID that has a non-null company

get.summary: Fetches a user by the given ID
get.description: Finds the user with the given ID in the database

200.description: Successfull fetch of a user from the databse

404.description: There does not exist any user in the database such that the given id matches their id

post.description: Creates a new company using a company name and optional Quickbooks import time

404.description: Company not found

get.summary: Gets a company from the database
get.description: Gets a company using the company ID

404.description: Company not found

patch.description: Updates the lastQuickBooksImportTime for a company by ID

get.summary: Gets a company's location from the database
get.description: Gets a company's locations using the company ID

post.description: Creates a new disaster with the provided information

get.description: Gets all disasters stored in the database

post.summary: Create an address for some location of a company
post.description: Creates a new location address with the provided information

get.summary: Gets an address for some location of a company
get.description: Creates a new location address with the provided information

200.description: The associated location address for the given information

404.description: The given UUID does not have an associated location address in the database

delete.description: Removes the location address with the provided id

400.description: Invalid location ID or no Company with that ID

get.description: Retrieves all disaster notifications for a specific user with optional filtering and pagination

404.description: User not found or no notifications found
Notification not found

patch.description: Marks a specific notification as read

404.description: Notification not found

404.description: Notification not found

post.description: Creates multiple disaster notifications at once for impacted users

400.description: Invalid request payload or UUID format

404.description: User or FEMA Disaster not found

get.description: Retrieves notification preferences for a specific user

404.description: User not found

put.description: Updates notification preferences for a specific user

400.description: Invalid request - empty payload or invalid user ID

404.description: User not found

get.summary: Generates an OAuth URL for the user and redirects them
Syncs a QB OAuth session to our DB
get.description: The path where the QuickBooks OAuth server redirects to upon a completed (successful or not) OAuth connection

post.summary: Bulk create or update new invoices
post.description: Creates new invoices according to the schema. If there is an invoice in the database with the same quickbooks_id, company_id pairing, then it will overwrite it's attributes

get.description: Get invoice with matching ID from the database

404.description: No Invoice with given UUID found

get.description: Get invoices for a company with pagination params. Note page numbes are 0-indexed.

404.description: No Invoice with given UUID found

get.summary: Get all line items for a given invoice
get.description: Get all line item for a given invoice

404.description: No Invoice Line Item with given UUID found

post.description: Creates a new purchase or updates an existing purchase with the provided information

404.description: Purchase not found when attempting to update

get.summary: Fetches all purchases for a company
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of purchases for the specified company

200.description: Successful fetch of company purchases from the database

get.summary: Fetches a purchase by the given ID
get.description: Finds the purchase with the given ID in the database

200.description: Successful fetch of a purchase from the database

404.description: There does not exist any purchase in the database such that the given id matches their id

post.description: Creates a new claim using a given company ID and disaster ID

get.summary: Gets all the claims associated with a company
get.description: Gets all the claims for a company using a company ID

404.description: Claims not found

delete.summary: Deletes a claim from the database
delete.description: Deletes a claim based off a claim ID
